hanzi-su-wiki:
縮

Значения

Сжиматься, укорачиваться; сжиматься, съеживаться; завивать (волосы); гофрировать; виться

Мнемоника

Усадка нитей 糸 в ткани сопоставима с давкой гостей на постоялом дворе 宿.

Варианты

缩
purpleculture_pinyin:
suō
to withdraw; to pull back; to contract; to shrink; to reduce; abbreviation; also pr. [su4]
отозвать; отступить; заключать соглашение; чтобы сжать; уменьшить; сокращение; также пр. [su4]

heisig_chinese_memo: After spending the night at an inn, spiderman discovered to his dismay that his costume had shrunk (shrink) in the wash, and no longer fit!
heisig_constituent: shrink, thread, spiderman, inn, house, person, hundred, one, ceiling, white, dove
koohiiStory1: After spending the night at an inn, spider man discovered to his dismay that his costume had shrunk in the wash, and no longer fit!
koohiiStory2: Don´t let the Inn wash your threads, they will shrink them!
kunYomi: ちぢ.む、ちぢ.まる、ちぢ.める、ちぢ.れる、ちぢ.らす
jp_example_words:
短縮(たんしゅく): shortening, abbreviation, reduction
縮まる(ちぢまる): to be shortened, to be contracted, to shrink
圧縮(あっしゅく): compression, condensation, pressure
恐縮(きょうしゅく): shame, very kind of you, sorry to trouble
縮小(しゅくしょう): reduction, curtailment
縮む(ちぢむ): shrink, be contracted
縮める(ちぢめる): shorten, reduce, boil down, shrink
縮れる(ちぢれる): be wavy, be curled
jp_readingExamples: 縮まる (ちぢ.まる), 縮む (ちぢ.む), 縮める (ちぢ.める), 縮らす (ちぢ.らす), 縮れる (ちぢ.れる)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: A magic thread fell from the roof onto the leader of a hundred people, causing him to shrink!
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Picture one hundred people under the same roof watching in horror as their leader suddenly shrinks to nothingness before them.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: As the leader shrinks, the hundred people start screaming and running around the entire place. As a result, everything is shook (しゅく) up. Especially the poor, shrunken leader, who gets knocked around the most.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: The leader gets shook so badly, he can't even call out to his people. They're going to trample his tiny, shrinking body!
Ru_Radicals: 化 (превращаться), 宀 (значок У), 小 (маленький), 幺 (короткая нить), 白 (белый), 糸 (нить)
Ru_trainchinese:
suō: (глаг) сжиматься, сокращаться; отступать, подаваться назад; экономить, сокращать (расходы)
sù: (графема) используется только в 缩砂密
Kanshudo_mnemonic: inns (宿) where you can pay with thread (糸) are shrinking
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Spidey doesn't trust the motel clothes washing service anymore because everytime he has a stay overnight they shrink his clothes.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " Shito " to " Su ", it means that it is tied up with a rope. "Said Wen": "Chaos. Congshi, Susheng. One said: Kaya." "Taiping Guangji" Volume Four and Two Five cited Jin Wangjia's "Supplementary Notes": "Take Xiangjin as a hook, shrink silk , Using the boat carp as bait, no more than ten days, fishing a white flood, three or four feet long."

" Shrink " can mean retreat. "Mandarin-Lower Vietnamese": "If you win and shrink, you will regret it later." Wei Zhao's note: "Win and shrink, advance and retreat."

" Shrink " also means short. "Huainanzi‧ Shi Zexun": "Meng Chun began to win, and Meng Qiu began to shrink." Gao You's note: "To win, to grow; to shrink, to shorten."

" Shrinking " also means shrinking. "Huainanzi-Lan Mingxun": "Spring and Autumn shrinks its harmony, heaven and earth eliminate its virtue." Gao You's note: "Shrink, hide also."

" Shrinking " also means owed, insufficient. "Wen Xuan-Ban Gu "You Tong Fu"": "It won't help me to move it, so I win it when I suffer." Li Shan's commentary quoted Xiang Dai as saying: "Win, too late; shrink, too late."

" Shrink " also refers to vertical and straight. "Book of Rites-Tan Gong Shang": "The ancient crowns shrink and sewn, but now they are also sewn." Zheng Xuan's note: "Shrink, vertical."

" Shrinking " can also mean taking. "Mandarin ‧ Chu Yushang": "If you look at it with your eyes, you will be beautiful, and if you shrink from financial use, you will be scarce. It is to gather the people for the benefit of self-proclaimed and barren people, and Hu Meizhi." Wei Zhao's note: "Shrink, speak out."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " Shito " and " Su ", it means that it is tied up with a rope.
humanum_full_description:
從「糸」，「宿」聲，表示用繩子捆起來。《說文》：「亂也。从糸，宿聲。一曰：蹴也。」《太平廣記》卷四二五引晉王嘉《拾遺記》：「以香金為鉤，縮絲綸，以舟鯉為餌，不踰旬日，釣一白蛟，長三四丈。」

　　「縮」可表示退。《國語‧越語下》：「贏縮轉化，後將悔之。」韋昭注：「贏縮，進退也。」

　　「縮」也表示短。《淮南子‧時則訓》：「孟春始贏，孟秋始縮。」高誘注：「贏，長也；縮，短也。」

　　「縮」亦表示收縮。《淮南子‧覽冥訓》：「春秋縮其和，天地除其德。」高誘注：「縮，藏也。」

　　「縮」還表示虧欠，不足。《文選‧班固〈幽通賦〉》：「斡流遷其不濟兮，故遭罹而贏縮。」李善注引項岱曰：「贏，過也；縮，不及也。」

　　「缩」還指縱、直。《禮記‧檀弓上》：「古者冠縮縫，今也衡縫。」鄭玄注：「縮，縱也。」

　　「缩」還能表示取。《國語‧楚語上》：「若於目觀則美，縮於財用則匱，是聚民利以自封而瘠民也，胡美之為。」韋昭注：「縮，言取也。」
humanum_short_description: 從「糸」，「宿」聲，表示用繩子捆起來。

①向後退，往回收：退縮。畏縮。縮手(喻不敢再做下去)。縮手縮腳(喻做事顧慮多，不大膽)。
②由大變小，由長變短：收縮。伸縮。壓縮。縮減。縮小。縮編。縮微(指利用照相技術等把文字圖像縮成極小的膠捲複製品)。
③捆束：“縮版以載”。
④直，理直：“自反而縮，雖千萬人，吾往矣”。
⑤濾酒去渣：縮酒。
⑥伸脹。

從「 糸 」，「 宿 」聲，表示用繩子捆起來。《說文》：「亂也。从糸，宿聲。一曰：蹴也。」《太平廣記》卷四二五引晉王嘉《拾遺記》：「以香金為鉤，縮絲綸，以舟鯉為餌，不踰旬日，釣一白蛟，長三四丈。」 「 縮 」可表示退。《國語‧越語下》：「贏縮轉化，後將悔之。」韋昭注：「贏縮，進退也。」 「 縮 」也表示短。《淮南子‧時則訓》：「孟春始贏，孟秋始縮。」高誘注：「贏，長也；縮，短也。」 「 縮 」亦表示收縮。《淮南子‧覽冥訓》：「春秋縮其和，天地除其德。」高誘注：「縮，藏也。」 「 縮 」還表示虧欠，不足。《文選‧班固〈幽通賦〉》：「斡流遷其不濟兮，故遭罹而贏縮。」李善注引項岱曰：「贏，過也；縮，不及也。」 「 缩 」還指縱、直。《禮記‧檀弓上》：「古者冠縮縫，今也衡縫。」鄭玄注：「縮，縱也。」 「 缩 」還能表示取。《國語‧楚語上》：「若於目觀則美，縮於財用則匱，是聚民利以自封而瘠民也，胡美之為。」韋昭注：「縮，言取也。」
From the sound of " Shito" to " Su", it means that it is tied up with a rope. "Said Wen": "Chaos. Congshi, Susheng. One said: Kaya." "Taiping Guangji" Volume Four and Two Five cited Jin Wangjia's "Supplementary Notes": "Take Xiangjin as a hook, shrink silk , Using the boat carp as bait, no more than ten days, fishing a white flood, three or four feet long." " Shrink" can mean retreat. "Mandarin-Lower Vietnamese": "If you win and shrink, you will regret it later." Wei Zhao's note: "Win and shrink, advance and retreat." " Shrink" also means short. "Huainanzi‧ Shi Zexun": "Meng Chun began to win, and Meng Qiu began to shrink." Gao You's note: "To win, to grow; to shrink, to shorten." " Shrinking" also means shrinking. "Huainanzi-Lan Mingxun": "Spring and Autumn shrinks its harmony, heaven and earth eliminate its virtue." Gao You's note: "Shrink, hide also." " Shrinking" also means owed, insufficient. "Wen Xuan-Ban Gu "You Tong Fu"": "It won't help me to move it, so I win it when I suffer." Li Shan's commentary quoted Xiang Dai as saying: "Win, too late; shrink, too late." " Shrink" also refers to vertical and straight. "Book of Rites-Tan Gong Shang": "The ancient crowns shrink and sewn, but now they are also sewn." Zheng Xuan's note: "Shrink, vertical." " Shrinking" can also mean taking. "Mandarin ‧ Chu Yushang": "If you look at it with your eyes, you will be beautiful, and if you shrink from financial use, you will be scarce. It is to gather the people for the benefit of self-proclaimed and barren people, and Hu Meizhi." Wei Zhao's note: "Shrink, speak out."

Seal characters (1)

縮字的基本解释

縮
suō

縮
sù
均见“缩”。

縮字的汉语字典释义

[①]［suō］
［《廣韻》所六切，入屋，生。］
亦作“摍1”。亦作“1”。“缩1”的繁体字。
(1)捆扎。
(2)退。
(3)短。
(4)收敛；收缩。
(5)亏欠，不足。
(6)节省，减缩。参见“縮衣節食”。
(7)纵；直。《礼记·檀弓上》：“古者冠縮縫，今也衡縫。”郑玄注：“縮，縱也。”《孟子·公孙丑上》：“自反而不縮，雖褐寬博，吾不惴焉。”杨伯峻注：“《檀弓》以'縮''衡'對言，爲'横直'之'直'；此則爲'曲直'之'直'。”参见“縮俎”。一说，縮读为“蹙”。蹙，近。
(8)取。
(9)滤酒去渣。参见“縮酌”。
(10)姓。战国时有缩高。见《战国策·魏策四》。
[②]［sù］
“缩2”的繁体字。
见“縮2砂蔤”。

縮字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【糸字部】　縮； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页935第27
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?所六切，音蹜。【說文】亂也。一曰蹴也。【爾雅·釋詁】縱縮，亂也。【註】縱放掣縮，皆亂法也。【儀禮·鄕飮酒禮】磬階閒縮霤北面鼓之。【註】縮，從也。霤以東方爲從。古文縮爲蹙。【禮·檀弓】古者冠縮縫，今也衡縫。【註】縮，從也。　又【爾雅·釋器】繩之謂之縮之。【註】縮者，約束之。【詩·大雅】縮版以載。　又【儀禮·郊特牲】縮酌用茅。【註】縮，去滓也。【左傳·僖四年】無以縮酒。　又【孟子】自反而縮。【趙岐註】縮，義也。【朱子·集註】縮，直也。　又【戰國策】縮于財用則匱。【註】歉也，贏之反也。　又【釋名】齊人謂車枕以前曰縮，言局縮也。　又【玉篇】退也，止也。　又【廣韻】斂也，短也。　又姓。【戰國策】安陵人縮高。　又【韻補】叶式律切。【班固·幽通賦】神先心以定命兮，命隨行以消息。斡流遷其不濟兮，故遭罹而贏縮。

考證：〔【左傳·僖元年】無以縮酒。〕　謹照原文元年改四年。
縮字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
縮字的起名意思

暂无。

Shrink
Basic explanation of words
Shrink
suō
Shrink
sù
See "shrinking".
Shrink
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［suō］
[Six cuts in "Guangyun", entering the house, giving birth. ]
Also known as "摍1". Also called "1". Traditional Chinese characters for "abbreviated 1".
(1) Bundling.
(2) Withdrawal.
(3) Short.
(4) Convergence; shrinkage.
(5) Insufficient and deficient.
(6) Save and shrink. See "shrinking clothes on a diet".
(7) Vertical; straight. "Book of Rites·Tan Gongshang": "The ancient crowns shrink and seam, but now they are evenly seamed." Zheng Xuan's note: "Shrink, and vertical." , I’m not worried.” Yang Bojun’s note: “Tan Gong uses the dialect of “Shu” Heng”, which is the “straight” of “Horizontal”; this is the “Straight” of “Curved straight”.” See “Short” ". In one word, it is abbreviated as "蹙". Flop, near.
(8) Take.
(9) Filter the wine to remove residue. See "shrinking".
(10) Last name. The height was reduced during the Warring States Period. See "Warring States Policy·Wei Ce IV".
[②]［sù］
Traditional Chinese characters for "abstract 2".
See "Shrink 2 sand rind".
Shrink
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not concentrated] [Shizi Department] 　Shrink; Kangxi strokes: 17; Page number: page 935 27
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? All six cuts, and sound. [Said Wen] Chaos too. One said Ke also. 【Erya·Shigu】shrink and chaos. Old glyph
Shrink
Name meaning
Nothing.
suō, sù
вм. 缩
Radicals: 糸, 宀, ｲ, 百  (thread, roof, leader, hundred)
Meaning Mnemonic
A magic thread fell from the roof onto the leader of a hundred people, causing him to shrink!
Picture one hundred people under the same roof watching in horror as their leader suddenly shrinks to nothingness before them.
Reading Mnemonic
As the leader shrinks, the hundred people start screaming and running around the entire place. As a result, everything is shook (しゅく) up. Especially the poor, shrunken leader, who gets knocked around the most.
The leader gets shook so badly, he can't even call out to his people. They're going to trample his tiny, shrinking body!
